greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Smallest palindrome greater than n in bases 2 and n.
link: Michel Marcus, Table of n, a(n) for n = 2..1000
mathematica: Do[ k = n +1; While[ RealDigits[ k, n ][ [ 1 ] ] != Reverse[ RealDigits[ k, n ][ [ 1 ] ] ] || RealDigits[ k, 2 ][ [ 1 ] ] != Reverse[ RealDigits[ k, 2 ][ [ 1 ] ] ], k++ ]; Print[ k ], {n, 2, 60} ]
program: a(n) = {my(j = n); while(! isok2(j, n), j++); j;} \\ _Michel Marcus_, Nov 16 2017
results.author: _Robert G. Wilson v_, Aug 15 2000
